website_summaries.verdict: The best because of its simple design, durable finish, and its support of Switch, PS Vita, and Nintendo DS games.
pros: Holds up to a total of 68 games across multiple portable platforms
The case zips firmly shut, and is soft but still very durable to store or travel with
cons: There is a limited amount of slots per cartridge type and the extra space (if any) can't really be used for much else

customer_reviews.title: Actually perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3ds xl, and it fits it perfectly! All the games fit wonderfully and don’t slide around. Then, I decided to try to store my vita games in it. Lo and behold, it has a space for vita games in the back! Just to see if I could, I tried to put my vita in it while my 3ds xl was also in there, and guess what. It FITS. Both consoles and games fit comfortably in the case, I don’t even have to strain to zip it! This was a great investment and
customer_reviews.author: Rylie Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for DS games
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this storage bag. My child only uses it for DS games right now. Just got my child a DS from Game Fellas. It was a great price,came with charger and the stylus came with it. I just needed a storage bag for it. Made my child happy when he got it for his birthday. Gave him the DS weeks before his birthday with a few games. Product is durable,sturdy,and good quality. It will last as long as it is keep up. I love this storage bag and thanks to the other reviews I bought it based on.
customer_reviews.author: T.J. TX Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case! As of this review I have only used it with 3DS and DS games, but it works wonderfully. I thought my 3DS collection was pretty big but it doesn't even fill up half of the case, which is perfect for my continuously growing collection.Games fit snugly and secure and only come out when you pull them. If you prefer something more sleek, stylish, and discreet for your game collection rather than a clear plastic case, I highly recommend this. It's just great!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea S

customer_reviews.title: Finally all my games in one place
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent game case for your DS, 3DS and Switch game collection. I really enjoy having all my games safely in one location. I'm not sure how long the elastic will last before it deteriorates like most elastic tends to, or if the elastic will effect the labels of my games, but it seems safe so far. It's a bulky case. I don't believe it's a good idea for travel, but for safely keeping your games at home, it's tough to beat. It's a bit pricey for what it is, but nothing else on this site compares to it, so it's worth picking up. If it was about $5 less, I would've bought two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: Good case Holds 48 DS  games
customer_reviews.text: It's a great case. But only holds 48 DS games the other 20 slots are for the Nintendo switch games. (which i do not own) I wish I would have read a bit more closely. But it's still a very secure easy case for all my games will be great to throw in my backpack so I can have all my games at my fingertips and I still have 24 slots to fill with games. :)
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: It works as intended 10 / 10
customer_reviews.text: I just got this as a gift for Christmas and I truly love it and it works as intended I needed this so badly because I travel a lot and carry all of my DS / 3DS / PS Vita game cards I am satisfied with this product and the material is pretty tough just in case if I drop it all of my cartridges are safe from being damaged so kudos to you 😉👍 I don't have any problems yet I will update this review if I encounter any problems so stay tuned 😉👍
customer_reviews.author: Eliezer Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is EXACTLY what I needed!! It's durable and holds all my games with room to spare for when I begin to get more and when I eventually get a Switch as well! I love it and HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT!!! Remember to read carefully! This comes exactly as it says it will! NOT ALL THE SLOTS ARE FOR 3DS/2DS/DS GAMES!! Some are for the Switch, as the description says! I'm happy for it, as I plan to get a Switch ASAP! So I know I'll be able to hold those games too! LOVE the product I got and would highly recommend to anyone who needs a sturdy case to hold your games in!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 68 game card storage holder. I recieved a 20 slot game card holder. the slots are too small for ds games so it really only holds a max of 16 ds games because of overlap. I have already started the return process.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great Case!
customer_reviews.text: This durable, great quality case is a must have. Perfect for organizing games and great for travel. Easy to load, easy to access games, durable and sturdy with a quality zipper closure. Not only makes it easy to store games or take them with you, but protects games and keeps them from dust and food and drink clean!
customer_reviews.author: J. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description
customer_reviews.text: Beware, I ordered this and got a Nintendo Switch case with only 20 game card slots, instead of the 3DS case with 68 game card slots.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Treat yo self
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Now a days, they have these cheap plastic cases that make me feel like I'm about to break my game trying to put them in and take them out. On top of that, you are only able to put 24, max. This case is lightweight, caries a BUNCH of games (I got GBA games to fit in sideways, though it's not advertised to fit GBA games), and to me, was 100% worth the 17 bucks. If you have more than 3 games, this is definitely worth buying. As of right now, I can't find any other case that holds as many games as this one. Buy it now, thank me later
customer_reviews.author: Jesse D.

customer_reviews.title: Great, Convenient Place to Store Games
customer_reviews.text: As someone who enjoys collecting Nintendo games, this case was exactly what I was looking for. I like to display the game cases on my shelf, but having the game cartridges all in one case is ideal for convenience. My other cases are hard plastic, so I was nervous that this one wouldn't hold up. The case is lightweight but sturdy with a somewhat hard exterior. It holds a lot of games, especially considering the price. It's perfect for travel. Overall, I'm very happy with it and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great game case
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case. The slots for the games are designed so that the games are held snug without them moving around too much, but without being too difficult to remove which has been a big problem for other cases I've used in the future. It is perfect if you have a large amount of games and want a nice, compact storage for them. The hard case is an added bonus so you don't have to worry about small impacts as well. Very nice product overall!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Nintendo switch games
customer_reviews.text: I got the travel case for the switch and it came with a couple of the cases for the game cartridges. At first 8 spots was enough but I’ve gotten a lot more games since then and had to find something else to store the games cartridges in safely. This works perfect and holds quite a few and in different sizing also. Works good for what I need and will hopefully keep the games safe. So far so good. If you need something for your switch games then this does the job well and the price is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. I don't have any Switch games, so the last two pages are empty. This makes it so this case will also fit my 3DS XL! It's nice to have all my games organized and in the same place as the system itself. I've been looking for something that holds this many games for so long, and this was the perfect thing. I only wish it had come in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Finally!! A game case that actually works and holds many games!!!
customer_reviews.text: It amazes me how hard it is to find 3DS game card holders. You'd think with the amount of 3DS games available for purchase, that they'd have plenty offerings of cases that can hold more than 24. Well, I am sooooo happy I found this! Not only does it hold my son's many 3DS games but it also holds his Nintendo Switch games as well! He loves that he can carry all of his games in one case and can easily identify the games without pulling them all the way out! As soon as his collection grows, we'll be ordering another case. Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job of holding the 2DS XL + a bunch of games. The pockets are all sized correctly for the new and old games, a problem I've had with other cases. It's nothing super fancy, but it's done well for my son. I'll update if we encounter any wear issues.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Case

customer_reviews.title: I love that this case will hold the different type of ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that this case will hold the different type of handheld games. Between my child and I we have quite a collection of DS/3DS/Vita and now Switch games. While we required more than 68 slots, I first wanted to ensure the quality of it before ordering a second one. Love the case and I just ordered another to finish putting our games in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I already bought 8 of these cases and they are great they hold my ds and 3ds games perfect and they don’t fall out it can only hold 48 ds and 3ds games the other 20 slots left can hold the switch and vita games perfect. I used all 68 slots for the switch games even though the 48 slots are a little to big for the games I had no problem with them falling out.
customer_reviews.author: 665steven

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and storage.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to organize all the DS and 3DS games we own. Great for travel and storage. I wish all the slots had been the same size. The last page was for Switch games and SD cards which is fine, but I bought this solely for the intention of holding our DS library. I also wish there was a version of this with a few more pages for future expansion.
customer_reviews.author: Cristin A. Gueho

customer_reviews.title: Such a great case!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was MADE for me. I have a huge assortment of DS, 3DS, Switch, and Vita games, and this holds them all securely and snugly. LOADS of space for everything. I will say, I wish it had more slots for Switch/Vita games, with the switch getting new games all the time, but it's much less of an issue for those who don't own a Vita (IE everyone) and thus don't have space taken by those games.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I use this for both switch and 3ds games. Holds everything in good order. Plenty of room for a lot of games. Games are protected by soft elastic on a fabric backing. They stay in place even when the case is dropped. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Finally can Fit all my Games in a single Case and Still have room! I Love it! Its Sturdy, It easy to Travel with, everything Stays in Place!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Fits lots of games and they stay put. Wish it had a spot for styluses but it doesn’t claim to so I didn’t deduct for that.
customer_reviews.author: Syra_87

customer_reviews.title: Buy this case first instead of a smaller one....
customer_reviews.text: Had to get this for the grand daughter after Christmas cause she got a few more games than the case I bought her could hold... Should have got this first since it is perfect and holds all her 3DS and Switch games together with room to spare....
customer_reviews.author: Carl Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great case to store your games
customer_reviews.text: You are going to be hard pressed to find a better case than this. It doesn't feel like it's made of any cheap material, so it feels pretty damn sturdy for the price. My only issue is that I don't own a switch, so I don't need all the slots allotted for those games. I got this case because it was a little cheaper than the others. Still, fantastic case and I'm glad I got this one.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Rios-Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and holds a LOT! Perfect for ds and 3ds games!
customer_reviews.author: M. Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This case has been excellent for having all of my cartridges immediately and conveniently available whenever I go out and travel. The casing itself is quite tough and it handled crowded packing excellently. While I wish there was a more even distribution between switch/vita and 3DS/DS slots, the slots themselves are a snug, comfortable fit and the case has done its job well. It has my recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: justsomeuser

customer_reviews.title: Great Hard Case!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as expected & made of good quality materials. My son, an avid gamer, had been looking for a combo case for his Nintendo games & this fit the bill! We both love that it does have that hard shell, as he travels frequently with his games, the extra protection is really nice compared to his softer cases.
customer_reviews.author: *Candid Candor*

customer_reviews.title: Material is sturdy & has a lot of diverse storage.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I previously bought a similar one from a different company, and it was a piece of junk. This card holder is great. The material & diverse holders is worth what I payed for. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Fits all of my DS and 3DS games
customer_reviews.text: This game holder fits all of my DS/3DS games with room to spare. It does have other slots that appear to be for memory cards.
customer_reviews.author: Keith P. Narey

customer_reviews.title: Great for game organizating
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my son’s ds game collection. Whether traveling or just being organized, this case is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stinky at first, but Fits All My Games Well
customer_reviews.text: Be warned, it stank when I first got it. But I aired it out for a couple weeks (possibly a little overkill but it doesn't smell anymore) and it's perfect now. Fits all of my DS games, and eventually will also fit my switch games! Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Butterfox 68 game storage
customer_reviews.text: This was just what my daughter needed to hold all of her Nintendo DS games. They all fit perfectly and I don't worry about them getting damaged because the case is well padded and very sturdy. '
customer_reviews.author: Joan Morales

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING. ONLY HOLDS 48 3DS games
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to hold 60 plus 3DS games. It only hold 48 despite the statement that it holds 68. The are 20 slots for SD cards. Total waste.
customer_reviews.author: HellsKitchenGadgets

customer_reviews.title: Its durable and practical.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the game card storage for my son, it's durable and it will help him to keep all his game cards organized. It will also allow him to travel easier with his games, and not having to worry about losing any, and less thing to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product—does what it’s supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Holds games. I won’t give it any less stars because it doesn’t come with a stylus holder because it doesn’t say it did and all we wanted was a game holder. It does it’s job. Purchase it. It’s lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven

customer_reviews.title: ONLY HOLDS 20 GAMES
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son- excited to be able to keep all of his games in one place. Despite the advertisement, the item I received has ONLY 20 slots for DS games (two pages with 10 slots on each) and 0 slots for Switch games! I am VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the multiple-Nintendo-game-system-owner!
customer_reviews.text: Love love LOVE how I can put all my Nintendo games in ONE case now! Sturdy and convenient. Lots of spaces, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: So/so
customer_reviews.text: Wish it would hold the games a lil better, always zip games can fall out.
customer_reviews.author: BOYD

customer_reviews.title: Vita game holder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my vita games. The smaller section hopes them perfectly. The larger ones area little loose but it does hold them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for storing all his extra games. It's nice to have them all in one place.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Traveled to Disneyland and back.
customer_reviews.text: Great portability for the kids to remain entertained on the plain
customer_reviews.author: J. Alex Borso

customer_reviews.title: Probably your best option?
customer_reviews.text: Good storage and cheap to buy, has hard cover case. Best if you have a lot of ds/3ds games since it only has one section meant for switch games
customer_reviews.author: Phriski

customer_reviews.title: Functional and useful.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing my games. Wish it had a bit more room to store adapter, but that's not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... in getting all our ds games organized n handie love it
customer_reviews.text: prefect in getting all our ds games organized n handie love it
customer_reviews.author: terib

customer_reviews.title: Good game case.
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted this for his 3ds games. It holds them all nicely, it doesn't take up too much space, and it zips close to keep them all safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R.H.

customer_reviews.title: Best capacity/price available. Not disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Great capacity and quality for the price. Would buy another. Thankfully, this fits all our DS, 3DS and Switch games currently. The only thing that could improve it is if one of the 'pages' was velcro removable so that you could take just a handful of games with you instead of your whole collection.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H Swift

customer_reviews.title: Ok if you are a 3ds and switch owner
customer_reviews.text: It would be nicer if all of the holes could hold both sizes (so if they were all bigger for 3ds games). But it's fuctionable enough.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole-reads2love

customer_reviews.title: Good Item
customer_reviews.text: Some of the pockets are too small for standard game cards
customer_reviews.author: Todd Heiler

customer_reviews.title: Game storage
customer_reviews.text: works great for game cartridge consolidation of 3DS & Switch
customer_reviews.author: hare43

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Holds lots of games and protects them well. Good for travel. I hated keeping up with so many little game cards in different places. This solves that problem well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty large but sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my PSVita games. Not a perfect fit but much better price than the actual PS brand name.
customer_reviews.author: Anisha

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t taken it anywhere but it was the right price and size for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: dylan

customer_reviews.title: Great! From three bulky 3DS boxes to one sleek carrier
customer_reviews.text: Great item, holds my ton of N 3DS games. I did notice that about halfway, the size of the pockets is different so might not fit the 3DS cartridges but until I have that many games, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Darkholm

customer_reviews.title: Buy this carrying case!!
customer_reviews.text: The case is the same size as my 3DS travel case, and holds tons of games. I have both DS and 3DS games and even a couple of Switch games. There is still plenty of slots left for more games. The case has a semi rigid outer casing so it will protect all the games. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy T Showers

customer_reviews.title: Great Case, Some slots too small
customer_reviews.text: Although it is a great case and passes all the other tests, a lot of the slots are too small for the DS Games, but it is a great case.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Easy for Kids to Use and Holds Games Well
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case. It is easy enough for my children to insert the games into the slots and they don't fall out when you open the case.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 10 yr old grandson who has so many games for his Nintendo Switch and 3DS. After many trial and errors (!), this is the best storage/travel case for all the cartridges. It keeps them in one place and protected. My grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: jrt

customer_reviews.title: The game card case I received cannot hold 68 game ...
customer_reviews.text: The game card case I received cannot hold 68 game cards. Plus the elastic slots are way too small to put in any 3ds cards. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Didn't have the order many items like this do
customer_reviews.text: A much higher quality then I expected. Didn't have the order many items like this do. Well made and well worth the price. One spot did have a bad seem but other then that it's great and holds my 3ds with games.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: bigger then it needs to be
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! but it has alot of wasted space
customer_reviews.author: Moria Grey

customer_reviews.title: Description is inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Description indicates that this product will fit a 2DS when in fact it does not.
customer_reviews.author: Rita B. Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Not big enough to carry cord, full case of games and game system. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: Xray girl

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Received the Nintendo Switch case instead of this one. Will update rating if I manage to get the correct item.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Crummy

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Fits all my DS 3DS and Switch games. And it has room for more since it holds so many.
customer_reviews.author: Adria

customer_reviews.title: If you have a lot of ds games or switch games, buy 2 or more
customer_reviews.text: Fits 2 packs of 36 ds and 3ds games, and 2 sides of NS games or sd cards
customer_reviews.author: Ontime

customer_reviews.title: Most roomy, versatile and tough game case ever.
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of DS, 3DS, and Switch games in my collection with no plans of slowing down anytime soon, and this case proved to be the MVP of all of them with room to spare, and with shock protection that was top notch for travel.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shreffler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great item fits all my games and its secure so I know i won't lose them would buy again
customer_reviews.author: veronica gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great case, good company
customer_reviews.text: The seller went out of his way to make sure I got the right product and did everything he could to fix any issues that arose. Would DEFINITELY purchase his items again if the need arose. Thanks again for all your help and keep up the good work. The case itself is VERY nicely made. Not too heavy and very compact. Holds all that it says it does and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Asura

customer_reviews.title: Durable and spacious!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Fits all my DS and Switch games. Very durable, I'm not afraid pf smaller family members accidently droping it, and it makes storage 100 times simpler!
customer_reviews.author: Tora

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift For Gamers on the Go
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game carrier. Keeps my games safe and organized. Though it is bigger than I had initially thought (it can't fit in my DS Carrier Bag), it's still a better alternative to a ziplock bag.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: The durability
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! He can fit his ds 3ds and switch games in it. We received this way before we were supposed to. I would def order again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Showers

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my younger sister who just turned 13 as well. It holds her games and they fit perfectly. Small enough to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Jalesha Blue

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I need it to do. Keeps my games safe and organized. No issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this case and when she get more games I ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and she loves it. She can keep her 3ds and switch games in one case. I would recommend this case and when she get more games I will buy another one.

customer_reviews.text: It was good except I wanted all the pockets the same size

customer_reviews.title: Holds games ok. But that's it.

customer_reviews.title: It's durable and very great for organizing
customer_reviews.text: It's durable and very great for organizing. My daughter had all her games scattered in different storage helpers. Now, she can have them all in one place. It's an awesome case!

customer_reviews.text: Holds all his games he has now. He loved this! Anything for the grandkids!

customer_reviews.author: Not gamer here.

customer_reviews.title: It has space that was a waste because I don't have any smaller cartidges than my ...
customer_reviews.text: It holds all the games and the plug all together. It has space that was a waste because I don't have any smaller cartidges than my new 3ds xl.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Angel Seto

customer_reviews.title: Almost an excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived almost as described. One of the game holding pockets was half un-stiched. Otherwise an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Segarini

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price!
customer_reviews.text: Holds games great! Color is very vibrant and case is of great quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: shelia

customer_reviews.title: arrived in great condition. Happy to have a case for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastically, arrived in great condition. Happy to have a case for my large collection of Pokemon games!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Clifford

customer_reviews.title: They are sending the wrong product.
customer_reviews.text: I received a switch case that only holds 20 when ordering this item. The switch case is designed to hold the switch and a set of joycons. I was severely disappointed upon getting the wrong item. I returned this and got the all black one, only to have another wrong item sent to me. The all black one only has room for 64 carts. And it's all the same size. It will work, since it's elastic and holds my games...but seriously. I would expect something as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Skavlem

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were needing. Product is true to what is advertised. Lots of storage and so far, very durable.
customer_reviews.author: D Welliver

product_meta.title: Butterfox Switch Game Card Case, 64 Slots, Storage Holder Hard Case for Nintendo Switch Game or PS Vita Or SD Memory Card (Blue Turquoise/Black)
product_meta.description:
Store and protect your valuable Nintendo Switch game, PS Vita game cartridges or SD cards with a durable hard case from a top case manufacturer 

We have been making quality cases for Nintendo consoles for many years. We are good at what we do. Our 3DS and Switch cases have always been top sellers on Amazon. Click seller name "Brendix" to see our quality cased made for Nintendo. 

< How to solve an issue If you have any issue with our product or service, simply send us a message via "Contact Seller". Your problem will be solved within 24 hours.
feature_bullets: Model: BF765. Durable hard shell case protects Nintendo Switch, PS Vita game cartridges or SD Cards from damages. This case is specifically designed for Nintendo Switch cartridges, PS Vita game cards and SD cards. Available in three sizes: 45, 64 and 80 game holders. Visit ButterFox store to find

Large Storage: 64 dedicated card holders for Nintendo Switch Game, PS Vita Games or SD Cards. 4 Micro SD cards storage slots. All slots are designed for Switch games or SD cards which fit perfectly. Unlike some other game cases you do not need to put small Switch game cards in large DS/3DS slots

EASY TO USE: Putting in and taking out game or SD cards takes no effort, ideal for both kids and adults. Unlike plastic game cases you do not have to worry about breaking the game or plastic case when removing the games

Compact Design: Our case is large inside and small outside ideal for both travel and home storage. Each slot is the perfect size for the compatible game cards. Unlike some other game cases you do not have to use much larger 3DS game slots for Switch games which tends to pop out of the slots
Available in multiple capacities. Go into our store to explore. Console and Games are not included.
